title: Queen wears face mask as she marks Unknown Warrior centenary
description: The monarch attended a private ceremony in Westminster Abbey to mark 100 years since the burial.

title: Greater Manchester's NHS hospitals suspend non-urgent care
description: Greater Manchester hospitals are treating "more Covid patients than at the peak of the first wave".

title: Gower sinkhole: Road opens after repairs
description: The sinkhole was caused by water running onto the road from a nearby farm, the council says.

title: US election 2020: How US networks reported the Biden win
description: After days of waiting, US networks reacted to Joe Biden being victor in Pennsylvania and therefore winning the election.

title: Five questions for Joe Biden on the economy
description: Coronavirus, climate, taxes, tech and trade - what will Joe Biden do?

title: Solskjaer back from brink again - but is another crisis inevitable?
description: With pressure mounting, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer delivered for Manchester United at Everton - but will it be a false dawn or is he back from the brink again?

title: US Election 2020: Moment BBC projects Biden victory on TV
description: The BBC projects that Joe Biden has topped the 270 electoral votes needed to defeat Donald Trump.

title: Joe Biden: Meet the Irish cousins cheering on the president-elect
description: Meet the Irish cousins hoping for a visit from the US president-elect after 'Ridin' with Biden'.

title: US election result: What Biden's victory means for rest of world
description: From Beijing to Berlin - the BBC looks at the impact of the ideological shift in the White House.

title: Joe Biden profile: Third White House run lucky for 'Middle Class Joe'
description: The president-elect has 40 years of political experience to call on, and to defend.

title: Jill Biden: From teacher to US first lady
description: Here's a look at what we know about the wife of Democratic president-elect Joe Biden.

title: What's the science behind mink and coronavirus?
description: Denmark's mink-related coronavirus scare has caused alarm, but scientists urge caution.

title: US Election 2020: Meet five new faces making political history in the US
description: From transgender State Senator Sarah McBride to 25-year-old Madison Cawthorn - here are some of the new faces making history in US politics.

title: Was 1995 the year that changed everything for disabled people?
description: It's 25 years since mass protests challenged perceptions of disabled people and helped win more rights.

title: Covid: How to survive a winter lockdown, from those who've done it
description: Tips on lockdown life in cold weather - from sub-zero coffee meet-ups to watching films in the bath.
